title: Understanding Correlation
text: Correlation measures the strength and direction of a linear relationship between two variables. It is important to choose the right method to calculate it.

title: Types of Correlation Coefficients
text: There are different methods to calculate correlation coefficients, such as Pearson, Spearman, and Kendall. Each has its own use case.

title: Choosing the Right Method
text: For continuous variables like height and weight, which method is most appropriate to find the correlation coefficient?
